message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you, and this is a fair price.
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $9,500 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $8,200?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm confident in the value of this product at $9,500, I'm willing to come down slightly to $9,000. This is my final offer.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. $9,000 is still a little bit above what I had in mind. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $8,500?
